name: Implicit Monitoring Solutions
overview:
Implicit Monitoring Solutions, LP is the long-standing dominant provider of satellite-based monitoring services in the oil and gas industry. The companyâ€™s system collects, communicates and delivers secure field production information to its global clients via a web-based reporting platform. Implicit offers monitoring solutions for EFMâ€™s, tanks, compressors, pump-off controllers, well-testing applications, and frac operations that require real-time data solutions.

Implicit has added satellite-based CONTROL functions to its services; such as sending Start-Stop-Change Speeds commands to pump drive controllers or setting plunger lift parameters. All of this can be done with an easy-to-use web interface at NO addtional cost.

funding_rounds.source_description: Implicit Monitoring Solutions LP of Dallas has received $25 million in private equity and debt funding commitments from B/K Venture Capital.
